result.name: dplus0045-anguilla-mbes-bathymetry-2m
result.notes:
Multi-beam echo sounder (MBES) data collected as part of the Darwin Plus 
funded project " Mapping Anguilla's 'Blue Belt' Ecosystem Services". The 
project aimed to develop local capacity to undertake comprehensive marine 
resource assessments of Anguilla’s ‘Blue-Belt’, delivering best practice 
guidance for combining satellite and acoustic surveys, to extend mapping into 
deeper waters for the first time.

organization.name: marine-environmental-data-information-network
organization.title: Marine Environmental Data & Information Network
organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.
